info.title: Northern Sámi Speller
Davvisámi čállindárkisteaddji
Noerhtesaemien staeriedimmiedïrregh
Nuorttasáme duollatjállemdárkastus
Nordsamisk stavekontroll
Nordsamisk rättstavning
Pohjoissaamen oikoluku
info.description: This is an fst-based speller for Northern Sámi made by Divvun/Giellatekno/UiT. It is based on the normative subset of the morphological analyser for Northern Sámi. The source code can be found at: https://victorio.uit.no/langtech/trunk/langs/sme/ License: GPL3+.

acceptor.title: Giellatekno/Divvun/UiT dictionary Northern Sámi
acceptor.description: Giellatekno/Divvun/UiT dictionary for Northern Sámi compiled for HFST.

errmodel.title: Levenshtein edit distance transducer
errmodel.description: Correction model for keyboard misstrokes, at most 2 per word.
